releases.description: This is a bug fix release that addresses issues in both Angular and Core components.

feat.title: Allow custom icons to be added from icon template

fix.title: Update combobox pill design
Fix datagrid filtering with ivy off
Fix css variables applied to the component
Improves default core tag implementation

releases.description: This is a bug fix release that addresses issues in both Angular and Core components.

fix.title: Fix clr-input-wrapper max width
Make datagrid header sticky no matter how many rows
Allow className to be passed down to the underlying component
Fix icon download svg
Fix broken link in website documentation

releases.description: This is a bug fix release that addresses issues in both Angular and Core components.

fix.title: Datagrid: trackBy items by provided trackBy option
Datagrid: correct way of assigning clrDgSelectable
Range input layout
Typo in button react wrapper
Double event on selection
Pane was losing state when rows update
Updated panel property to match stepper panel for TS 4
Sync child alerts when slot changes in alert group
Display the correct error when validating
Export form layout enum for strict typing
Fix modal exception
Handle TypeError when calling triggerStatusChange
Remove unnecessary position on layout

releases.description: This is a bug fix release that addresses issues in both Angular and Core components.

fix.title: Corrected DOM order of close buttons in modals
Removed unnecessary aria-label on expand/collapse SVG in Stack View
Fixed issue with Angular assigning inputs for @clr/angular components that are not ready
Removed min-height from datagrid header to prevent overlapping data
Added focus trap to @clr/core modal and check for hidden to prevent hidden focus traps
@clr/core documentation improvements
Fixed accessibility issue with @clr/core icon button
Fixed issue with close button wrapping in @clr/core modal header
Ensure required property exists before throwing a warning with @clr/core property decorator
Fixed margin issue with @clr/core lists inside of layouts
Added a disabled state for @clr/core tags
Improved support for anchor tags and @clr/core button elements
Fixes for @clr/angular schematics

releases.description: This is the official 4.0.0 release, which is fully compatible with Angular 10.

fix.title: Hide vertical nav helper button from screen readers
Fix tab content width in IE11
Fix potential undefined error in form control error message
Set aria-current in wizard steps
Handle possible exception in stepper with unknown first panel
Fix border on last accordion panel when opened
Reverted a change in 3.1.5 that tried to fix Ivy compatibility but cause potential memory leak in some uses of Datagrid
Removed unnecessary inline style on wizard button
Fix Combobox focus indicator animations
Fix form success and helper messages hiding when they should be visible

releases.description: Stability was the goal for this release, where a number of bugs have been fixed and everything has been checked before we target a stable release soon!

feat.title: Allow shift+tab in focus trap to rebound for accessibility

fix.title: Form control placeholder color and opacity updated for accessibility
Fix some Angular form controls that don't get marked as touched
Fix compatibility issue in Datagrid when Ivy was disabled
Fix popover toggle behavior that broke arrow key events
Fix missing border on Datagrid detail pane with limited rows

releases.description: Introducing the new Combobox component! The Combobox is a significant form control that allows you to define searchable select lists with dynamic content and options. No more breaking changes will occur in v4 after this release, and works with Angular 10 stable.

feat.title: New Combobox form component for creating dynamic and complex searchable inputs

fix.title: Fix datagrid placeholder to work with a screen reader

releases.description: Clarity moves forward with a new prerelease for the upcoming Clarity v4 milestone. There are a number of breaking changes and improvements for this version, which will only work with Angular 10 and TypeScript 3.9.

fix.title: Update several colors for accessibility
Fix z-index so column switcher is above modals
Fix possible undefined error when opening a popover synchronously
Fix selection for server-driven Datagrids in some uses
Fix alert text width in IE11

feat.title: Support Datagrid column resizing with keyboard for accessibility
Support Datagrid expandable rows for accessibility
